definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: resort to, seek (cf. Ar. darasa rub over, efface (a site), tread (wheat), fig. read repeatedly, study; dre4 beat (a path), discuss, Pa. practise in; NH search out (a meaning), expound)—
(tread a place,) resort to, frequent, with religious obj., c. acc. loc. Am 5:5, 2Ch 1:5, [[לְ]] loc. De 12:5.

definitions.title: 4. a.
definitions.body: seek, with idea of demanding, require ([[בקשׁ]] is seek, simply), with acc. lost sheep De 22:2, Ez Eze 34:6, Eze 34:8, Eze 34:11; goat Le 10:16, Le 10:16 (P); with [[אחר]], after green fodder Job 39:8.

definitions.body: Note.—[[וְדָרְשׁוּ מֵחָרְבוֹתֵיהֶם]] and beg out of their desolate places Ps 109:10 (Ki al. wedŏršu, vid. Baer); many MSS. rd. [[דָּֽרְשׁוּ]], so most interpr.; LXX Hup Bi Che rd. [[גּׁרְשׁוּ]] be driven from.
